EmailTemplate.subject: Congratulations on your successful DealChicken promotion
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Congratulations on your successful DealChicken promotion. You performed so well we'd like you give you an exclusive opportunity to be featured again on our site.
As a reminder, your promotion will include:
Email delivery to our exclusive (and growing) list of local subscribers Your offer featured on the DealChicken homepage and in the mobile app Your offer in the newspaper, the area's trusted news source Your offer featured on the newspaper's website Your offer promoted on our Facebook and Twitter pages
The great news is, we'll keep bringing new customers to your events. So whether you have a brand new performance or simply want to stay top-of-mind, DealChicken will continue to help you sell more tickets.
I will call you this week to set up a time to schedule your next promotion or feel free to contact me at {!Contact.OwnerFirstName} {!Contact.OwnerLastName} {!Contact.OwnerEmail} or {!Contact.OwnerPhone}.
Can I change the promotion? If needed, we can work with you to craft a new offer that will fit your current needs.
Will my promotion reach a new audience? DealChicken is constantly growing our list of email subscribers, so your offer will be seen by previous and new DealChicken members.
*Utpal M. Dholakia, Rice University "How Businesses Fare with Daily Deals as they Gain Experience: A Multi-Time Period Study of Daily Deal Performance," June 25, 2012.
